info.name: Cumulocity API
info.description:
Environment variables for this Postman Collection:

url = the IP adress/domain of your cumulocity server
auth = your base64 encoded tenant/username:password or username:password

body.raw:
module SMSTESTSINGLE; 

insert into SendSms 
select 
  "+49123456789" as receiver, 
  "Hello World" as text 
from AlarmCreated a 
where a.type = "smsSingleTestAlarm";

item.name: Example: Discard operations if device unavailable

body.raw:
module DISCARDOPERATIONS; 

insert into UpdateOperation
select
  "FAILED" as status,
  e.operation.deviceId.value as deviceId
from OperationCreated e 
where getString(findManagedObjectById(e.operation.deviceId.value), "c8y_Availability.status") = "UNAVAILABLE";

body.raw:
10,100,POST,/alarm/alarms,application/vnd.com.nsn.cumulocity.alarm+json,application/vnd.com.nsn.cumulocity.alarm+json,&&,UNSIGNED NOW,"{""source"":{""id"":""&&""},""type"":""c8y_MyAlarmFromSmartREST"",""text"":""This alarm was created by using SmartREST"",""severity"":""MAJOR"",""status"":""ACTIVE"",""time"":""&&""}"
10,200,POST,/measurement/measurements,application/vnd.com.nsn.cumulocity.measurement+json,application/vnd.com.nsn.cumulocity.measurement+json,&&,UNSIGNED UNSIGNED NOW UNSIGNED,"{""c8y_SmartMeasurement"":{""temp1"":{""value"":&&,""unit"":""C""},""temp2"":{""value"":&&,""unit"":""F""}},""time"":""&&"",""source"":{""id"":""&&""},""type"":""c8y_SmartMeasurement""}"
10,300,PUT,/inventory/managedObjects/&&,application/vnd.com.nsn.cumulocity.managedObject+json,,&&,,"{""c8y_Hardware"":{""model"":""&&"",""revision"":""&&""}}"
10,301,PUT,/alarm/alarms/&&,application/vnd.com.nsn.cumulocity.alarm+json,,&&,,"{""status"":""CLEARED""}"
10,302,PUT,/devicecontrol/operations/&&,application/vnd.com.nsn.cumulocity.operation+json,,&&,,"{""status"":""SUCCESSFUL""}"
10,600,GET,/identity/externalIds/c8y_Serial/&&,,,&&,,
10,601,GET,/devicecontrol/operations?deviceId=##&status=PENDING,,,##,,
10,602,GET,/inventory/managedObjects/&&,,,&&,,

request.description:
#### For a detailed description of the API please check out our [SmartREST Reference Guide](http://cumulocity.com/guides/reference/smartrest/)

You have to register all templates (request and response) in one single request.

For a better overview this example contains only request templates.

###### Syntax:
10,{unique id},{request method},{uri},{content type},{accept},{placeholder},{parameter type},{template string}


* unique id: message identifier inside die SmartREST template
* request method: HTTP method to use for the request
* uri: the uri to the Cumulocity ressource
* content type: HTTP Content-Type header
* accept: HTTP Accept header
* placeholder: string that will be replaced in the template string with the values of a SmartREST request
* parameter type: optional list to set data type of parameters for validation in SmartREST
* template string: request body including placeholders that will be send by SmartREST

#### For a detailed description of the API please check out our [SmartREST Reference Guide](http://cumulocity.com/guides/reference/smartrest/)

You have to register all templates (request and response) in one single request.

For a better overview this example contains only response templates.

###### Syntax:
11,{unique id},{base},{condition},{response value},{response value}, ...


* unique id: message identifier inside die SmartREST template
* base: the base object that should be check for objects (e.g. $.operations in an operation collection)
* condition: only objects with this fragments will be returned
* response value: value to return from the object
#### For a detailed description of the API please check out our [SmartREST Reference Guide](http://cumulocity.com/guides/reference/smartrest/)
#### For a detailed description of the API please check out our [SmartREST Reference Guide](http://cumulocity.com/guides/reference/smartrest/)
#### For a detailed description of the API please check out our [SmartREST Reference Guide](http://cumulocity.com/guides/reference/smartrest/)
